meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>concurrently</kanji> <kanji>use</kanji> one thing for multiple purposes, you're using something with a <vocabulary>combined use</vocabulary>. Something that is <vocabulary>serving two purposes</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
